summary: This module defines a suite of unit tests for the PSF analysis utilities in the SimTools package, including helpers for creating PSF images and tests for functions such as PSF detection, radius scanning, cumulative data extraction, effective area calculation, image data retrieval, PSF setting, and photon summation within a radius.
business_intent: Validate the functionality and correctness of point spread function (PSF) analysis components to ensure reliable image processing and scientific calculations in astronomical simulations.
